original_text: From the Gadites there went over to David at the stronghold in the wilderness mighty and experienced warriors, expert with shield and spear, whose faces were like the faces of lions and who were swift as gazelles upon the mountains:
korean_text: 갓 사람 중에서 광야에 있는 요새에 이르러 다윗에게 돌아온 자가 있었으니 다 용사요 싸움에 익숙하여 방패와 창을 능히 쓰는 자라 그의 얼굴은 사자 같고 빠르기는 산의 사슴 같으니

sentences.original_text: From the Gadites there went over to David
at the stronghold in the wilderness
whose faces were like the faces of lions
and who were swift as gazelles upon the mountains
